name: Helicopter Game
short_description:
Helicopter game is a free game to play. The game is very simple, all you got to do is fly a helicopter. But be careful  here as there would be blocks from which you will have to protect your helicopter from. You are the pilot of the helicopter and you will be controlling the helicopter with the help of the computer mouse. Left clic on the mouse would fly the helicopter and releasing the left click would stop the engine. Be alert as the helicopter may hit the blocks.
Ther e are many other helilcopter games where the user will also have an option to shoot the opponents and fly safe. In other game,you will head hefty fight chopper outfitted with up to date firearms and special gadgets. Your main objective is to remove terrorists discharge facets and small hands industries placed all over the world. There are two basic objectives in possible Helicopter Game
